Articles.Content:
I have 2 mods that have installed ModuleManager. One is ver 2.5.1 and the other is 2.5.10.

Do I need both of them, or will it cause some trouble? After I installed the second modulemanager, when I've tried to burn to Mun, once my path enters the mun's SOI, my path starts flicking and shifting between 1 path that continues as if there was no Mun intercept, and one that shows the Mun intercept path.

If I need to remove 1, which should I remove?
Always keep one and only one copy of ModuleManager, keep it in the root of GameData, and keep the newest (highest-number) version for your KSP version.
